ygData.subject: Re: Iron Raptor
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Prowl nods, not completely convinced. He wanted to question Iron Raptor more, but he knew that she would not lie to him. I know, love, he says, sounding

::Prowl::

Prowl nods, not completely convinced. He wanted to question Iron 
Raptor more, but he knew that she would not lie to him.

"I know, love," he says, sounding like a bot who was trying to 
convince himself, "Its just a random thought."

He glances at Iris, making a mental note to dump her in that stream 
after this was all over. Prowl nods, leaning a bit toward Iron Raptor 
as he feels her lean her head against his shoulder.

"Ok, let's get on with this," he says, his beast mode head (chest 
plate in robot mode) splitting into two and sliding aside, revealing 
his spark. His systems were already working on removing the code that 
Iris had mentioned.

"Ready, love?" he asks, looking into Iron Raptor's eyes, sliding his 
hands to her shoulders.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> 
> * Iron Raptor hadn't failed in see the expressions in Prowls face 
as her and 
> Iris argued about Donobot and such, knowing for a fact that Prowl 
would 
> probably get the wrong idea about what she had admitted to.
> Sure. She's looked up Dinobots file, just to see what she could 
find out 
> about him.
> Believe it or not, she was facinated about him. She never had any 
intended 
> feeling or anything. But it's kinda hard not to notice the only 
other 
> velociraptor in the same groupe as you are.
> It also just facinated her about how he could seem so emotionless 
and such.
> It made her edgy around him, but she really didn't know him the 
more she 
> thought about it.
> But she didn't like Dinobot, not in the way Prowl obviously 
thought. But she 
> really didn't know if she liked him really either, it's hard to 
when all you 
> know about them is what you read in files.
> 
> Iron Raptor bumped up against Prowls shoulder for a moment, hearing 
in his 
> voice that he hadn't liked the subject.*
> 
> " I don't like him, Prowl. If that's what you're thinking? I just 
wanted to 
> know a bit about him."
> 
> IRIS: " Yeah, I guess I can back up that comment. But I never said 
that you 
> liked him to begin with."
> 
> * Iron Raptor growled towards Iris*
> 
> " Well, you seemed to be leaning towards that direction a little 
bluntly"
> 
> IRIS: " Slag! I couldn't even imagin you two together! To the pit! 
Just 
> imagin the kids out of that coupling!! No. I gotta abmit, even 
feather head 
> here is better for you then that Pred with a bad 'tude!"
> 
> * Iron Raptor rolled her optics but couldn't argue. Dinobot was way 
too mean 
> for her to begin with, and she just wondered how Tavatron could 
manage to be 
> round him almost 27 7.
> But that wasn't what mattered now, it was the merging which was the 
main 
> subject.
> She leaned towards Prowl a bit more before laying her head on his 
> shoulder-plate.*
> 
> " You should know that you're the only one I could ever want."
> 
> * And with that she snuggled her head a bit into his neck, but they 
had work 
> to be done, and eventually get her into her robot mode again.
> But she was ready when he was.
> 
> Iris never was one for sentiment, almost making a sickening wound 
as she saw 
> the couple.
> She sighed*
> 
> IRIS: " Anyway...as soon as the code is disabled just let your 
spark exit 
> your chest, then the energy from that should make her spark exit as 
well, 
> and then they should begin to merge. Simple as that.
> But you have to be relaxed, Prowl. And you mind has to be 
concintrated on 
> this task. Otherwise you're asking for disaster."
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
